title: Mini Notepad - The Simple & Fast Online Notepad
metaDescription: Your free, fast, and simple online notepad. Write, save, and share notes seamlessly. Supports dark mode and offline use. No ads, just pure focus.

featureFast: A quick and simple notes app designed for speed.

seoTitle: Best Free Online Notepad - Offline Support & Dark Mode
seoDescription: Mini Notepad is a completely free online notepad tool with offline support, dark mode, Markdown editing, and cloud sharing. Ad-free experience focused on providing a simple and fast note-taking solution. Works on all devices including phones, tablets, and computers.
seoKeywords: online notepad,free notepad,offline notepad,dark mode notepad,markdown editor,cloud sharing,ad-free notepad,simple notepad,quick notepad,cross-device notepad
templatesPageDescription: Explore our collection of professional templates for notes, documents, and projects. Ready-to-use templates for meetings, planning, journaling, and more.
templatesPageKeywords: notepad templates,markdown templates,meeting notes template,project planning template,journal template,document templates,note templates,writing templates
quickNotesDesc: Quickly capture ideas, to-dos, and important information anytime, anywhere with auto-save support
markdownWritingDesc: Full Markdown syntax support including code highlighting, math formulas, and tables
collaborativeSharingDesc: Generate share links with one click to easily collaborate and share note content with others
darkModeSupportDesc: Built-in dark theme to protect your eyes, perfect for night use and extended writing sessions
crossDeviceDesc: Responsive design that works perfectly on phones, tablets, computers, and all devices
exportOptionsDesc: Export as Markdown files for easy backup and use in other tools
faq1Answer: Yes, Mini Notepad is completely free to use with no hidden fees or premium features. We promise to keep it free forever.
faq2Answer: Your notes are saved locally on your device by default. They only upload to the cloud when you actively share them. Cloud data is immediately deleted when you cancel sharing.
faq3Answer: Yes, all notes are saved locally and work perfectly without an internet connection. Only the sharing feature requires network access.
faq4Answer: Supports all modern browsers and devices including Windows, Mac, Linux, Android, iOS, and more.

seoKeywordParagraph1: Mini Notepad is a completely free online notepad tool with offline support, dark mode, Markdown editing, and cloud sharing. No registration required, all notes are saved locally by default to protect your privacy and security.
seoKeywordParagraph2: Our online notepad supports all modern browsers and devices including Windows, Mac, Linux, Android, iOS platforms. Responsive design ensures perfect user experience on phones, tablets, and computers.
seoKeywordParagraph3: As the best free notepad app, we provide fast, simple, ad-free note-taking experience. Features include auto-save, one-click sharing, multi-format export, making it ideal for work and study.

legalDisclaimer: Mini Notepad is a free online notepad tool. We are committed to protecting your privacy, with all notes saved locally on your device by default. By using this service, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
seoFooterDescription: Mini Notepad provides completely free online notepad service with offline support, dark mode, Markdown editing and more features.
dataCollectionDesc: Mini Notepad is committed to protecting your privacy. We adopt a local-first design philosophy:
noPersonalInfo: No collection of personal identification information
dataUsageDesc: Your note data is completely saved on your local device, and we cannot access your note content. Notes are only temporarily uploaded to our servers when you actively choose to share them.
dataSharingDesc: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties. When you cancel sharing a note, the related data is immediately deleted from our servers.
userRightsDesc: You have complete control over your data:
rightToAccess: Access and view your data at any time
rightToDelete: Delete your data at any time
rightToExport: Export your data at any time
contactInfoDesc: If you have any questions about our privacy policy, please contact us:
serviceDescriptionText: Mini Notepad is a free online notepad service designed to provide users with a simple, fast, and secure note-taking experience.
userResponsibilitiesText: When using our service, you need to follow these rules:
lawfulUse: Use the service lawfully and do not violate local laws and regulations
noHarmfulContent: Do not create or share harmful, illegal, or inappropriate content
respectOthers: Respect others' rights and do not infringe on others' privacy
serviceAvailabilityText: We strive to maintain stable service operation, but do not guarantee 100% service availability. We may temporarily interrupt service for maintenance, upgrades, or other reasons.
limitationText: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Mini Notepad is not liable for any losses caused by the use or inability to use this service.
changesText: We reserve the right to modify these terms of service at any time. Significant changes will be notified to users through website announcements.
